intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Najran Developers ("we", "us", "our") collects, uses, shares, and protects information when you use our mobile application (the "App") and related services. This policy is prepared for Google Play and Apple App Store submission requirements.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
paragraphs: Depending on how you use the App, we may collect the following categories of data:
bullets: Information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and support messages.
Technical and device data, including device model, operating system, app version, language, and approximate region.
Usage and diagnostics data such as crash logs, performance metrics, and feature interaction events.
Push notification token only if you enable notifications.
We do not collect precise location, contacts, microphone, photos, or health data unless clearly requested inside a specific feature with your permission.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Information
bullets: To provide, maintain, and improve App functionality.
To respond to support requests and communicate important service updates.
To detect, prevent, and address technical issues, abuse, or security incidents.
To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms.

sections.heading: 3. Legal Bases (Where Applicable)
paragraphs: Where data protection laws require a legal basis, we process personal data based on consent, contractual necessity, legitimate interests (service reliability and security), and legal obligations.

sections.heading: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
paragraphs: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data only in the following cases:
bullets: With trusted service providers who process data for hosting, analytics, support, or reliability monitoring under confidentiality obligations.
When required by law, legal process, or valid governmental request.
To protect rights, safety, and security of users, the public, or our services.
In connection with a merger, acquisition, or asset transfer, subject to appropriate safeguards.

sections.heading: 5. Data Retention
paragraphs: We keep personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, resolve disputes, enforce agreements, and comply with legal requirements. When data is no longer required, we delete or anonymize it.

sections.heading: 6. Data Security
paragraphs: We apply reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect personal data. No method of transmission or storage is completely secure, but we continuously work to reduce risk and improve safeguards.

sections.heading: 7. Children's Privacy
paragraphs: The App is not directed to children under 13 (or the minimum age in your jurisdiction). We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe a child provided personal data, contact us so we can remove it.

sections.heading: 8. Your Privacy Rights
paragraphs: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, restrict, or object to processing of your personal data, and to withdraw consent. You may submit requests by email, and we will respond within a reasonable period as required by law.

sections.heading: 9. International Data Transfers
paragraphs: Your data may be processed in countries other than your own. Where required, we use appropriate contractual and legal safeguards for international data transfers.

sections.heading: 10. Changes to This Policy
paragraphs: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Material changes will be posted in the App or on our website with an updated effective date. Continued use of the App after updates means you accept the revised policy.

sections.heading: 11. Contact Us
paragraphs: For privacy questions, requests, or complaints, contact us using the details below.

footerNote: If any provision of this policy conflicts with mandatory applicable law, the applicable law will prevail.
